org.afree.ui
Class Align

java.lang.Object
  org.afree.ui.Align

public final class Align
extends java.lang.Object

A utility class for aligning RectShapes.

Method Detail

align

public static void align(RectShape rect,
                         RectShape frame,
                         int align)
Aligns one RectShape (rect) relative to another RectShape ( frame).

Parameters:
rect - the RectShape to be aligned.
frame - the reference frame.
align - the alignment type.
